RustFS.description: RustFS is an S3-compatible object storage server. Rock-on guide. Based on the official Docker image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
RustFS.more_info: This Rock-on uses the official RustFS Docker image to implement a single RustFS instance with a single object storage share, suitable for use on a private network. If your connections traverse a network you do not control, consider using a VPN for encryption.

/data.description: Choose a share for RustFS object storage that can be accessed by the Rock-on's user [e.g. create a group rfsgroup with GID=10001 and create a user rfsuser with UID=10001 assigned to the previously created group].
/data.label: RustFS Object Storage [e.g. rustfs-obj-store]

RUSTFS_CONSOLE_ENABLE.description: Enable RustFS Web management interface (true or false).
RUSTFS_CONSOLE_ENABLE.label: Enable Console [e.g. true]
